casebody.data:
Howard B. MORROW, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 11923. United States Court of Appeals Ninth Circuit. Dec. 8, 1948. Curtis & Curtis and Jesse W. Curtis, Jr., all of San Bernardino, Cal., for appellant. James M. Carter, U. S. Atty., and Clyde C. Downing, and James C. R. McCall, Jr., Asst. U. S. Attys., all of Los Angeles, Cal., for appellee.

Before MATHEWS, STEPHENS, and BONE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court is affirmed.
